title: How do I know whether my phone is using its mobile data connection or a Wi-Fi connection to access the Internet?
answer: The Wi-Fi connection is always used first whenever it is successfully set up. If ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111411)is displayed in the upper right corner of the screen, that means you are using a Wi-Fi connection to access the Internet.
